original_text: She also said, ‘Abraham would never have thought that I would feed a child at my breasts. But I have given birth to a son for him, even when he is old.’
korean_text: 또 이르되 사라가 자식들을 젖먹이겠다고 누가 아브라함에게 말하였으리요마는 아브라함의 노경에 내가 아들을 낳았도다 하니라

sentences.original_text: that I would feed a child at my breasts
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 유방으로 아이를 먹일 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: But I have given birth to a son for him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그를 위해 아들을 낳았다
